hero.name: Brice Convers

purpose.0: I am an engineering student, at Ense3

hero.dive: Let's dive straight into my purpose

about.description: I am a french engineering student in Grenoble INP univerty. My major is signal processing and I am seeking an internship to work in a the biomedial fields.

points.1: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.

points.1: Use of matlab to work on data processing scripts.

Following projects showcases my skills and experience through

links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my
ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies,
and manage projects effectively.
